## Setup
1. Go to iclicker.com and record your attendance.  
2. Login to the lab computer (please don't use your personal computer).  
3. Navigate to github.com and login.  
4. Wait for the midterm to be released.  

## Midterm
1. Find the class repository "datascibiol" (https://github.com/jmledford3115/datascibiol).   
2. Download a copy the class repository to the desktop.  
3. Clone your repository to the desktop.  
4. Copy the midterm folder and paste it into **your** repository.  
5. Open the midterm .rmd file and wait for instructions.  

## Submit the Midterm
1. Save your work and knit the .rmd file.  
2. Open the .html file and "print" it to a .pdf file.  
3. Go to the class Canvas page and open Gradescope.  
4. Submit your .pdf file to the midterm assignment- be sure to assign the pages to the correct questions.  
5. Commit and push your work to your repository.
